IP_SYN_1_style_4:
Procedure: Rigid Bronchoscopy, FB Removal, Stent Placement.
Indication: Migrated esophageal stent.
Steps:
1. GA induced, LMA placed.
2. Flex bronch showed stent occluding trachea/LMS.
3. Rigid bronch inserted.
4. Foreign body (esophageal stent) removed using forceps and APC.
5. Large TE fistula noted.
6. Dynamic Y-stent deployed to cover fistula and patent airway.
7. ETT placed through stent.
